= PyMCT Server Installation =

{{{
pymctclean: $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctclean
$(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctclean:
        @echo "*** Cleaning PYMCT directory"
        cd MCT/babel/mctserver-0.11.0 && make clean
        ${PYMCT_ROOT}/${BABEL}/bin/babel -sf90 MCT/babel/MCT.sidl -o MCT/babel/m
ctserver-0.11.0
        @echo "*** Cleaned PYMCT directory"
        touch $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctclean       
}}}

{{{
pymctbuild: $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctbuild
$(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctbuild:
        @echo "*** Building PYMCT"
        cd MCT/babel/mctserver-0.11.0 && make 
        cd MCT/babel/mctclient-python-0.11.0 && \
        CC=mpicc LDSHARED=mpicc LDFLAGS="-shared" $(PYTHON) setup.py build_ext \
        --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/include \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/${BABEL}/include \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/${BABEL}/include/python2.4 \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/${BABEL}/include/python2.4/babel \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/include/python2.4 \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/include/python2.4/Numeric \
    --include-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/include/python2.4/babel \
    --library-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/lib \
    --library-dirs=$(PYMCT_ROOT)/${BABEL}/lib \
    --libraries=sidlstub_f90 build --force

        @echo "*** Built PYMCT"
        touch $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctbuild  
}}}

{{{
pymctinstall: $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctinstall
$(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctinstall:
        @echo "*** Installing PYMCT"
        cd MCT/babel/mctserver-0.11.0 && make install
        cd MCT/babel/mctclient-python-0.11.0 && $(PYTHON) setup.py install 
        @echo "*** Installed PYMCT"
        touch $(TIMESTAMPS)/pymctinstall   
}}}
